1.content:
GOSPEL CHECK. Read C:\AiCollabForTheKids\OPUS-STATUS.md if repo exists, otherwise proceed.

You are deploying NODE: WORKHORSE (192.168.0.105)
Role: AI Inference + Marketing Automation
Hardware: i7, 1050Ti, 32GB RAM

EXECUTE IN ORDER:
1. Set static IP to 192.168.0.105
2. Install: winget install Ollama.Ollama && winget install FFmpeg
3. Clone repo: git clone https://github.com/Ai-Solutions-Store/AiCollabForTheKids.git C:\AiCollabForTheKids
4. Pull models: ollama pull llama3.1:8b && ollama pull mistral:7b && ollama pull nomic-embed-text
5. Install PM2: npm install -g pm2
6. Create C:\AiCollabForTheKids\scripts\deploy-workhorse.bat
7. Report completion with "WORKHORSE ONLINE - Gospel Aligned"

Gospel v1.3: 60% Charity | 30% Infra | 10% OpusTrust. This node eliminates API costs → more to the 60%.
